Description: Colonial Style Furniture is graceful and refined, often characterized by the use of turnings, curved legs and motifs to present an elegant appearance. Colonial Style Furniture on Pepperfry sees Indian craftsmen interpreting European period styles (such as the Queen Anne and Georgian styles) in indigenous woods like Sheesham and Mango.
